item.title: My new side-project
item.description: Why ? Along the years, I created many side-projects (never finished one ðŸ˜…). Each one got its own user management code. I have other projects in mind, but I thought this time, I’m going to build an application to avoid re-implementing the same system over and over again ! Many solutions already exists, so why build an other one ? Because the goal here is not to provide an application for the world to use, it’s about learning stuff.
